CUBE_DC
Class Cube

java.lang.Object
  CUBE_DC.Cube

public class Cube
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a three-dimensional cube. Contains methods for rotation, matrix multiplication, and generating drawable polygons from the faces of the cube. Also keeps track of an arbitrary axis and rotation around this axis.

Author:
David

Constructor Summary
Cube()
          Initializes a cube centered at the origin with sides of length 2.

rotateAroundAxis

Parameters:
axis - the vector that represents the arbitrary axis
theta - the angle to rotate around the arbitrary axis (in radians)
